file.name: gaia-oas32.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    AbstractCartGroupInfo:
      properties:
        checkedItems:
          description: 组内已选中商品数
          type: number
        checkedLines:
          description: 组内已选中购物车行数，Sku数量
          format: int32
          type: integer
        childGroups:
          description: 子购物车组
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/AbstractCartGroupInfo'
          type: array
        groupType:
          description: 购物车组类型
          enum:
          - CART
          - ENTITY
          - VIRTUAL
          - VALID
          - SHOP
          - ACTIVITY
          - INVALID
          - INVENTORY_SHORTAGE
          - LINE
          type: string
        totalItems:
          description: 组内商品总数
          type: number
        totalLines:
          description: 组内购物车行数
          format: int32
          type: integer
      title: AbstractCartGroupInfo
      type: object
    AccountInformation:
      properties:
        email:
          description: 邮箱
          type: string
        fullName:
          description: 昵称
          type: string
      title: AccountInformation
      type: object
    ActivityInfo:
      properties:
        benefitId:
          description: 新版权益id
          format: int64
          type: integer
        code:
          description: 活动编码
          type: string
        desc:
          description: 描述信息
          type: string
        displayName:
          description: 显示名称
          type: string
        expiredAt:
          description: 活动实效时间
          format: date-time
          type: string
        extra:
          additionalProperties:
            type: string
          description: 其它扩展信息
          type: object
        id:
          description: 活动id
          format: int64
          type: integer
        label:
          description: 工具标签
          type: string
        level:
          description: 级别
          format: int32
          type: integer
        name:
          description: 活动名称
          type: string
        outerId:
          description: 外部活动编号
          type: string
        shopId:
          description: 店铺id
          format: int64
          type: integer
        startAt:
          description: 活动开始时间
          format: date-time
          type: string
        subCode:
          description: 活动二级编码
          type: string
      title: ActivityInfo
      type: object
    ActivityOperationParams:
      properties:
        buyerId:
          description: 买家ID
          format: int64
          type: integer
        cartLineIdSet:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        cartType:
          description: 购物车类型
          enum:
          - cart.type.online
          - cart.type.offline
          - cart.o2o.online
          type: string
        clientType:
          description: 客户端类型
          enum:
          - PC
          - H5
          - IOS
          - ANDROID
          - WECHAT
          type: string
        divisionIds:
          description: 地址区域ID集合
          type: string
        guestId:
          description: 访客标识
          type: string
        promotionActivityCode:
          type: string
        promotionActivityId:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        selectedGiftSkuIdSet:
          items:
            format: int64
            type: integer
          type: array
        sourceFrom:
          description: 请求来源
          type: string
        storeId:
          description: 线下实体店ID
          format: int64
          type: integer
      required:
      - cartType
      - clientType
      - divisionIds
      title: ActivityOperationParams
      type: object
    ActivityResultVO:
      properties:
        activity:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActivityInfo'
        activityPrice:
          description: sku优惠后的价格(sku级别优惠才有此信息)
          type: number
        display:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/DisplayInfo'
        platform:
          type: boolean
      title: ActivityResultVO
      type: object
    ActivitySwitchParams:
      properties:
        activitySwitchLines:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/CartActivitySwitchLineParam'
          type: array
        buyerId:
          description: 买家ID
          format: int64
          type: integer
        cartType:
          description: 购物车类型
          enum:
          - cart.type.online
          - cart.type.offline
          - cart.o2o.online
          type: string
        clientType:
          description: 客户端类型
          enum:
          - PC
          - H5
          - IOS
          - ANDROID
          - WECHAT
          type: string
        divisionIds:
          description: 地址区域ID集合
          type: string
        guestId:
          description: 访客标识
          type: string
        sourceFrom:
          description: 请求来源
          type: string
        storeId:
          description: 线下实体店ID
          format: int64
          type: integer
      required:
      - cartType
      - clientType
      - divisionIds
      title: ActivitySwitchParams
      type: object
    AddParams:
      properties:
        buyerId:
          description: 买家ID
          format: int64
          type: integer
        cartType:
          description: 购物车类型
          enum:
          - cart.type.online
          - cart.type.offline
          - cart.o2o.online
          type: string
        clientType:
          description: 客户端类型
          enum:
          - PC
          - H5
          - IOS
          - ANDROID
          - WECHAT
          type: string
        guestId:
          description: 访客标识
          type: string
        lines:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/CartAddLineParam'
          type: array
        sourceFrom:
          description: 请求来源
          type: string
        storeId:
          description: 线下实体店ID
          format: int64
          type: integer
      required:
      - cartType
      - clientType
      title: AddParams
      type: object
    Address:
      properties:
        address:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Area'
          type: array
        city:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Area'
        community:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Area'
        detail:
          type: string
        postcode:
          type: string
        province:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Area'
        region:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Area'
        street:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Area'
      title: Address
      type: object
    AddressInfo:
      description: 行政区域地址信息实体
      properties:
        englishName:
          description: 英文名
          type: string
        id:
          description: 地址ID
          format: int64
          type: integer
        lat:
          description: 纬度
          format: double
          type: number
        level:
          description: 级别
          format: int32
          type: integer
        lon:
          description: 精度
          format: double
          type: number
        name:
          description: 名称
          type: string
        orderNo:
          description: 排序号
          type: string
        pid:
          description: 父级ID
          format: int64
          type: integer
        pinyin:
          description: 拼音
          type: string
        unicodeCode:
          description: 名称对应的 unicode 编码
          type: string
      title: AddressInfo
      type: object
    AppAuthAppleBean:
      properties:
        accountInformation:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountInformation'
        appName:
          type: string
        appleUserId:
          description: apple 用户唯一标识
          type: string
        authorizationCode:
          description: apple验证信息
          type: string
        bind:
          description: 第三方绑定参数 默认为false
          type: boolean
        identityToken:
          description: apple的jwt格式token
          type: string
      title: AppAuthAppleBean
      type: object
    AppAuthFacebookBean:
      properties:
        accessToken:
          description: 访问令牌
          type: string
        appName:
          type: string
        bind:
          description: 第三方绑定参数 默认为false
          type: boolean
      required:
      - accessToken
      title: AppAuthFacebookBean
      type: object
    AppAuthGoogleBean:
      properties:
        appName:
          type: string
        bind:
          description: 第三方绑定参数 默认为false
          type: boolean
        idToken:
          description: ID令牌
          type: string
      required:
      - idToken
      title: AppAuthGoogleBean
      type: object
    AppAuthQQBean:
      properties:
        accessToken:
          type: string
        appName:
          type: string
        bind:
          description: 第三方绑定参数 默认为false
          type: boolean
        openId:
          type: string
        unionId:
          type: string
      title: AppAuthQQBean
      type: object
    AppAuthWeChatBean:
      properties:
        appName:
          type: string
        bind:
          description: 第三方绑定参数 默认为false
          type: boolean
        code:
          type: string
      title: AppAuthWeChatBean
      type: object
    AppAuthWeiBoAppBean:
      properties:
        accessToken:
          type: string
        appName:
          type: string
        bind:
          description: 第三方绑定参数 默认为false
          type: boolean
      title: AppAuthWeiBoAppBean
      type: object
    AppAuthWeiBoBean:
      properties:
        accessToken:
          type: string
        appName:
          type: string
        bind:
          description: 第三方绑定参数 默认为false
          type: boolean
      title: AppAuthWeiBoBean
      type: object
    AppAuthWxAppBean:
      properties:
        appName:
          type: string
        avatarUrl:
          description: 头像地址
          type: string
        bind:
          description: 第三方绑定参数 默认为false
          type: boolean
        code:
          description: 授权码
          type: string
        nickName:
          description: 昵称
          type: string
      title: AppAuthWxAppBean
      type: object
    Area:
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
      title: Area
      type: object
    AriesBaseProfileFindByIdRequest:
      properties:
        id:
          description: 会员id
          format: int64
          type: integer
      required:
      - id
      title: AriesBaseProfileFindByIdRequest
      type: object
    AriesProfileFindByIdAndCodeRequest:
      properties:
        glCode:
          description: 账户科目
          type: string
        id:
          description: 会员id
          format: int64
          type: integer
        levelTemplateCode:
          description: 等级模板编码
          type: string
      required:
      - glCode
      - id
      - levelTemplateCode
      title: AriesProfileFindByIdAndCodeRequest
      type: object
    AriesProfileFindByIdRequest:
      properties:
        forbiddenDesensitization:
          description: 禁止脱敏
          type: boolean
        id:
          description: 会员id
          format: int64
          type: integer
      required:
      - id
      title: AriesProfileFindByIdRequest
      type: object
    AriesProfileFindByIdentifyCodeListRequest:
      properties:
        identityList:
          description: 会员标志信息列表
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        queryKey:
          description: 会员标志信息类型
          enum:
          - MOBILE
          - EMAIL
          - WECHAT
          type: string
      required:
      - identityList
      - queryKey
      title: AriesProfileFindByIdentifyCodeListRequest
      type: object
    AriesProfileFindByMobileAndCodeRequest:
      properties:
        glCode:
          description: 账户科目
          type: string
        levelTemplateCode:
          description: 等级模板编码
          type: string
        mobile:
          description: 会员手机号
          type: string
      required:
      - glCode
      - levelTemplateCode
      - mobile
      title: AriesProfileFindByMobileAndCodeRequest
      type: object
    AriesProfileFindByMobileRequest:
      properties:
        mobile:
          description: 手机号
          type: string
      required:
      - mobile
      title: AriesProfileFindByMobileRequest
      type: object
    AriesProfileFindByNicknameRequest:
      properties:
        nickname:
          description: 会员昵称
          type: string
      required:
      - nickname
      title: AriesProfileFindByNicknameRequest
      type: object
    AriesProfileFindByOuterIdAndCodeRequest:
      properties:
        glCode:
          description: 账户科目
          type: string
        levelTemplateCode:
          description: 等级模板编码
          type: string
        outerId:
          description: 会员卡号
          type: string
      required:
      - glCode
      - levelTemplateCode
      - outerId
      title: AriesProfileFindByOuterIdAndCodeRequest
      type: object
    AriesProfileFindByOuterIdRequest:
      properties:
        outerId:
          description: 会员卡号
          example: 66000000100001
          type: string
      required:
      - outerId
      title: AriesProfileFindByOuterIdRequest
      type: object
    AriesProfilePageRequest:
      properties:
        certificateNo:
          description: 证件号
          type: string
        city:
          description: 市ID
          type: string
        country:
          description: 国家
          type: string
        detailAddress:
          description: 详细地址
          type: string
        email:
          description: 邮箱
          type: string
        ext1:
          description: 预留字段1
          type: string
        ext2:
          description: 预留字段2
          type: string
        ext3:
          description: 预留字段3
          type: string
        extraJson:
          description: 预留字段3
          type: string
        forbiddenDesensitization:
          description: 禁止脱敏会员信息
          type: boolean
        from:
          description: 注册渠道
          type: string
        fromType:
          description: 注册渠道类型
          format: int32
          type: integer
        gender:
          description: 性别
          format: int32
          type: integer
        id:
          description: 会员ID
          format: int64
          type: integer
        idList:
          description: 会员ID列表
          items:
            format: int64
            type: integer
          type: array
        mobile:
          description: 手机号
          type: string
        nickname:
          description: 会员昵称
          type: string
        outerId:
          description: 会员卡号
          type: string
        pageNo:
          description: 当前页码-默认1，从1开始
          format: int32
          type: integer
        pageSize:
          description: 每页条数-默认20，最大1024
          format: int32
          type: integer
        province:
          description: 省ID
          type: string
        region:
          description: 区ID
          type: string
        registerEndAt:
          description: 注册查询截止时间
          format: date-time
          type: string
        registerStartAt:
          description: 注册查询开始时间
          format: date-time
          type: string
        street:
          description: 街道ID
          type: string
        type:
          description: 会员类型
          format: int32
          type: integer
        typeList:
          description: 会员类型列表
          items:
            format: int32
            type: integer
          type: array
        updatedEndAt:
          description: 更新查询截止时间
          format: date-time
          type: string
        updatedStartAt:
          description: 更新查询开始时间
          format: date-time
          type: string
      title: AriesProfilePageRequest
      type: object
    AriesProfileUpdateRequest:
      properties:
        avatar:
          description: 会员头像
          type: string
        birthday:
          description: 生日
          format: date-time
          type: string
        certificateNo:
          description: 证件号
          type: string
        city:
          description: 市ID
          type: string
        country:
          description: 国家
          type: string
        detailAddress:
          description: 详细地址
          type: string
        email:
          description: 邮箱号
          type: string
        ext1:
          description: 预留字段1
          type: string
        ext2:
          description: 预留字段2
          type: string
        ext3:
          description: 预留字段3
          type: string
        extraJson:
          description: 预留字段3
          type: string
        firstName:
          description: 名
          type: string
        from:
          description: 注册渠道
          type: string
        fromType:
          description: 注册渠道类型
          format: int32
          type: integer
        gender:
          description: 性别
          format: int32
          type: integer
        id:
          description: 会员id
          format: int64
          type: integer
        invitationCode:
          description: 裂变信息
          type: string
        isDelete:
          description: 逻辑删除 删除(1) 否(0)
          format: int32
          type: integer
        lastName:
          description: 姓
          type: string
        mobile:
          description: 手机号
          type: string
        nickname:
          description: 会员昵称
          type: string
        outerId:
          description: 外部ID
          type: string
        province:
          description: 省ID
          type: string
        region:
          description: 区ID
          type: string
        registerAt:
          description: 注册时间
          format: date-time
          type: string
        srv:
          description: 服务渠道
          type: string
        srvType:
          description: 服务渠道类型
          format: int32
          type: integer
        status:
          description: 会员状态
          format: int32
          type: integer
        street:
          description: 街道ID
          type: string
        type:
          description: 会员类型
          format: int32
          type: integer
        userId:
          description: 用户id
          type: string
      required:
      - id
      title: AriesProfileUpdateRequest
      type: object
    AriesRuleRouteEventRequest:
      properties:
        body:
          type: string
        eventCode:
          type: string
      title: AriesRuleRouteEventRequest
      type: object
    ArticleCategoryDTO:
      properties:
        __trantorExtendFields:
          type: object
        _fields:
          type: object
        articleNum:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        createdAt:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        createdBy:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'
        description:
          type: string
        hasArticle:
          type: boolean
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        isDeleted:
          type: boolean
        name:
          type: string
        parentId:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        sortNum:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        status:
          type: string
        subCategoryList:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArticleCategoryDTO'
          type: array
        updatedAt:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        updatedBy:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'
      title: ArticleCategoryDTO
      type: object
    ArticleDTO:
      properties:
        __trantorExtendFields:
          type: object
        _fields:
          type: object
        articleIds:
          items:
            format: int64
            type: integer
          type: array
        articleType:
          type: string
        auditRemark:
          type: string
        categoryId:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        categoryIds:
          type: string
        content:
          type: string
        createdAt:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        createdBy:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'
        creatorId:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        creatorName:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        firstAndSecondCategoryName:
          type: string
        firstCategoryId:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        firstCategoryName:
          type: string
        headImageUrl:
          type: string
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        isDeleted:
          type: boolean
        keyword:
          type: string
        pageNo:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        pageSize:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        secondCategoryId:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        secondCategoryName:
          type: string
        seoDescription:
          type: string
        sortNum:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        status:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        top:
          type: string
        updatedAt:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        updatedBy:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'
      title: ArticleDTO
      type: object
    Attachment:
      properties:
        files:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/File'
          type: array
      title: Attachment
      type: object
    AttachmentApi:
      properties:
        files:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/File'
          type: array
      title: AttachmentApi
      type: object
    AuditInfo:
      properties:
        auditType:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        createdAt:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        log:
          type: string
        status:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        targetId:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        tenantId:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        updatedAt:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        updatedBy:
          type: string
      title: AuditInfo
      type: object
    AuthContentInfo:
      description: 用户权限树信息
      properties:
        dynamicRoles:
          description: 动态角色权限信息
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthInfo'
          type: array
        roles:
          description: 静态角色权限信息
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthInfo'
          type: array
      title: AuthContentInfo
      type: object
    AuthInfo:
      properties:
        base:
          type: string
        context:
          additionalProperties:
            type: string
          type: object
        names:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        treeNodeSelection:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        type:
          format: int32
          type: integer
      title: AuthInfo
      type: object
    AuthorizeByThirdPartBean:
      properties:
        appName:
          description: 应用名称
          type: string
        targetUrl:
          description: 登录成功重定向地址
          type: string
        type:
          description: 第三方类型
          example: github,wechat,qq,weibo,wxapp,wechat_mp,dingding
          type: string
      required:
      - type
      title: AuthorizeByThirdPartBean
      type: object
    B2bPartnerFullInfo:
      properties:
        auditStatus:
          description: 审批状态
          type: string
        code:
          description: 编码
          type: string
        createdAt:
          description: 创建时间
          format: date-time
          type: string
        createdBy:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'
        enterpriseId:
          description: 企业id
          format: int64
          type: integer
        id:
          description: id
          format: int64
          type: integer
        legalRepresentativeName:
          description: 法人代表姓名
          type: string
        name:
          description: 合作伙伴名称
          type: string
        partnerIdentify:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/MDEnterpriseInfo'
        roleType:
          description: 角色类型
          type: string
        status:
          description: 状态
          type: string
        type:
          description: 组织机构类型
          type: string
        updatedAt:
          description: 更新时间
          format: date-time
          type: string
        updatedBy:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'
      title: B2bPartnerFullInfo
      type: object
    B2bPurchaseSaveRequest:
      properties:
        id:
          description: 合作伙伴id
          format: int64
          type: integer
        partnerIdentify:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnterpriseParam'
      title: B2bPurchaseSaveRequest
      type: object
    B2bSupplierSaveRequest:
      properties:
        id:
          description: 合作伙伴id
          format: int64
          type: integer
        partnerIdentify:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnterpriseParam'
      title: B2bSupplierSaveRequest
      type: object
    BackCategoryAncestorsInfo:
